TextView.android:text: From the earliest days of mankind on the Earth, we have cherished a magnificent dream of being able to soar in the heavens. Applying the superb, self-trained knowledge of engineering, man changed the persistent vision of human flight representing a fundamental turning point in human history.
Techfest calls upon the air-zealots to participate in Aviator. Use all your whacky ideas, design and fly aircraft and change the vision of human flight.
